name: What do People Do All Day Recycled Storybook Purse
description:
Once upon a time there was a very loved children's book written by Richard Scarry. This book was bright and colorful and it's pages were turned many times. As the years went by the book got a little old and worn and the child grew up and moved on to other things. The poor book was discarded. It's taped pages had yellowed and it's inscription for a dear aunt had faded. It was discarded. (Don't be discouraged the story ends well). Then one day an environmentally conscious lady snagged the old book and with a little bit of magic she turned it into a georgous purse and it had purpose once again. The purse and it's new owner (that would be you) lived happily ever after.

Made with the recycled pages of "What Do People Do All Day"'s Train Trip Story, recycled linens and various other recycled fabrics. Inside has two pockets, bottom sits flat. Stitched to clear vinyl for increased durability.

name: The Monster at the End of This Book Recycled Storybook Purse
description:
Recycled from a favorite of mine. The Monster at the End of This Book shows Grover at his most nervious and anxious as he tries everything possible to keep you from turning the pages and getting to the monster at the end of the book. A great book recycled into a fabulous one of a kind eco chic bag.

Made with a recycled book, recycled linens, recycled denim and stitched to vinyl for increased duarbility. Two inside pockets, bottom sits flat.

For more Storybook Purses and other products made form recycled materials go to www.repurposed4you.com

name: Dr.Seuss's ABC's Recycled Storybook Purse
description:
Made from a recycled preloved copy of Dr. Seuss's ABC's this purse is bright and colorful and shows how fun "green" can be!

Made from a recycled book, recycled linens and vinyl. Two inside pockets. Bottom sits flat. Stitched to vinyl for increased durability. One of a kind.

For more Storybook Purses and other products made form recycled materials go to www.repurposed4you.com

name: Dick and Jane Recycled Storybook Purse
description:
Dick and Jane had no idea, back in the day, when they were teaching kids to read that they would one day be "green". The are now adorning this eco friendly purse. made from a preloved recycled copy of Dick and Jane and other recycled materials, this purse feels like fall to me.

Made from a recycled book, recycled linens and other recyceld fabrics and stitched to clear vinyl for increased durability. Two inside pockets, bottom sits flat.

For more Storybook Purses and other items made from recycled materials go to www.repurposed4you.com

name: Where the Wild Things Are Recycled Storybook Purse
description:
Made from a recycled copy of every boy's fave book, the bag is so very different that the rest of the bags in our collection. The soft muted colors are set nicley with the recycled linens that we have used for the handles, lining and bottom. 

Each bag has the same color scheme, but do to the fact that we use recycled materials each bag may be slightly different than the one pictured here.

All bags are the same size approx 12x12. All bags have two inside pockets and sit flat on the bottom. All bags are stitched to clear vinyl for increased durability.

For more Storybook Purses and other items made from recycled materials go to www.repurposed4you.com
